name: Portfolio
tagline: A showcase of my current works
body:
### The Artwork by Itself.
I began this piece by locating photography that is licensed free for commercial use. Using the flower element from one photo, and [GIMP](https://www.gimp.org/), I produced this piece â€” (You can right click and save any of the images below to examine them more closely):

![main artwork](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/houseapple/portfolio/gh-pages/artwork/all-one-d1-online.jpg)


### Overlaying Different Headline Fonts
I've also tried using different fonts for the blog post headline.  I don't have the licensing for some of these fonts, but right now I'm more interested in how they work from a visual design perspective.

#### Option 1: A Bold Italic Serif Font:
![option 1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/houseapple/portfolio/gh-pages/artwork/text1d.jpg)

#### Option 2: A Regular Serif Font:
![option 1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/houseapple/portfolio/gh-pages/artwork/text2d.jpg)
